column2: England have beaten Australia 2-1 in their Euro 2016 warm-up friendly - 18-year-old Marcus Rashford now England's youngest debut goalscorer
Republic of Ireland's Euro 2016 warm-up friendly against Netherlands has finished 1-1 at the Aviva Stadium
Northern Ireland have beaten Belarus 3-0 in their Euro 2016 warm-up friendly at Windsor Park
Judge orders Johnny Depp to stay 100 yards away from estranged wife Amber Heard after she said he threw mobile phone at her during fight
More than 100 scientists have called for the Olympic Games to be moved or postponed due to the #Zika virus outbreak
U.S. military official says coalition airstrikes have killed 70 Islamic State fighters including the group's leader in #Fallujah in Iraq
Rafael Nadal has pulled out of the #FrenchOpen with a wrist injury
Andy Murray has beaten Croatia's Ivo Karlovic 6-1 6-4 7-6 (7/3) in the third round of the #FrenchOpen
